name: SDSBSH
description:
epilepsy warning for the whole thing
be safe

SDSBSH is a portmanteau please treat it as such

read a short story

jump around some picture

get close to cat faces and hear sounds because of it

don't hurt your ears :(

move with WASD and SPACE
sometimes press other keys
like H
it restarts your position on the screen
i press J when the fragments come up
you can always try other keys though

there is no fullscreen
